question: Show me all information of the latest 10 movie
query: select * from netflix_titles where date_added is not null order by date_added desc limit 10

question: Show me title, director, cast, and release year of netflix movies
query: select title, director, cast, release_year from netflix_titles

question: show me all information
query: select * from netflix_titles where country similar to '%United States%|%United Kingdom%'

question: Show me 10 random data from the database
query: select * from netflix_titles order by random() limit 10
